org.cpsolver.ifs.algorithms

Class NeighbourSearch<V extends Variable<V,T>,T extends Value<V,T>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cpsolver.ifs.assignment.context.NeighbourSelectionWithContext<V,T,NeighbourSearch.NeighbourSearchContext>
      • org.cpsolver.ifs.algorithms.NeighbourSearch<V,T>
  • Type Parameters:
    V - Variable
    T - Value
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    CanHoldContext, HasAssignmentContext<V,T,NeighbourSearch.NeighbourSearchContext>, NeighbourSelection<V,T>, LazyNeighbour.LazyNeighbourAcceptanceCriterion<V,T>, SolutionListener<V,T>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    GreatDeluge, HillClimber, SimulatedAnnealing

    public abstract class NeighbourSearch<V extends Variable<V,T>,T extends Value<V,T>>
extends NeighbourSelectionWithContext<V,T,NeighbourSearch.NeighbourSearchContext>
implements LazyNeighbour.LazyNeighbourAcceptanceCriterion<V,T>, SolutionListener<V,T>
    Base class for the search techniques like hill climber, great deluge, or simulated annealing. It implements the SolutionListener and the variable neighbourhood selection.
    Version:
    IFS 1.3 (Iterative Forward Search)
    Copyright (C) 2014 Tomáš Müller
    muller@unitime.org
    http://muller.unitime.org

    This library is free software; you can redistribute it and/or modify it under the terms of the GNU Lesser General Public License as published by the Free Software Foundation; either version 3 of the License, or (at your option) any later version.

    This library is distributed in the hope that it will be useful, but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. See the GNU Lesser General Public License for more details.

    You should have received a copy of the GNU Lesser General Public License along with this library; if not see http://www.gnu.org/licenses/.
    Author:
    Tomáš Müller

      • addNeighbourSelection

        protected void addNeighbourSelection(NeighbourSelection<V,T> ns,
                                     double bonus)
        Add neighbour selection
        Parameters:
        ns - a selection
        bonus - execution bonus (more bonus means more executions of this neighbour selection, see NeighbourSelector)

      • setHCMode

        protected void setHCMode(boolean hcMode)
        Set HC mode for all the neighbour selections that support the HillClimberSelection interface.
        Parameters:
        hcMode - true if the search is a hill climber (worsening moves are always rejected)

      • accept

        public boolean accept(Assignment<V,T> assignment,
                      LazyNeighbour<V,T> neighbour,
                      double value)
        Accept lazy neighbour -- calling the acceptance criterion with lazy = true.
        Specified by:
        accept in interface LazyNeighbour.LazyNeighbourAcceptanceCriterion<V extends Variable<V,T>,T extends Value<V,T>>
        Parameters:
        assignment - current assignment
        neighbour - neighbour that was assigned
        value - change in overall solution value
        Returns:
        true if the neighbour can be accepted (false to undo the assignment)

        public abstract String getParameterBaseName()
        Parameter base name. This can be used to distinguish between parameters of different search algorithms.
        Returns:
        solver parameter base name for this search technique
